- Pulse is an AUTOBOT map and allows players to take a journey inside the DECEPTICON giant TRYPTICON, challenging fans to explore his twisted interior corridors to overload the central power core located within.
- Static is a DECEPTICON map that thrusts players into a bevy of multi-level rooms riddled with environmental traps that can be used for their advantage.

Three new competitive multiplayer maps include:
- Horizon is a picturesque statuary overlooking the war-torn AUTOBOT home city of Iacon, complete with wide open courtyards and tight spaces for close quarters combat.
- Sector is an old maintenance facility used by the DECEPTICONS during the legendary war and allows for open vehicle navigation, especially dive-bombing jets and those with long range weapons.
- Metropolis is set high above the clouds and drops players straight into the bombed out ruins of a high rise Iacon city building. Liquid energon drips from broken pipes and sparking electricity crackles from severed wires as it was once served as a fierce central battleground on Cybertron.

name: Tactics Ogre: Let Us Cling Together - Premium Edition
description:
A remake version of the Super Famicon game Tactics Ogre: Let Us Cling Together, released on PlayStation Portable. The North American and European versions keep the original Title: "Tactics Ogre: Let Us Cling Together".

The premium edition contains:
Copy of the game
44 page hardback artbook: 'The World of Tactics Ogre'
Exclusive Mini Soundtrack CD

name: Decent Checkers
description: Checkers is a timeless classic, steeped in rich history. This release supports 4 rulesets and includes PvE, PvP, and puzzle modes. From the casual checkers enthusiast to the competitive master, this game is sure to provide hours of entertainment and mental stimulation.

name: Murtop
description: Murtop is fast-paced arcade game packed with action, as if it was taken out directly from the 80's. Do you have enough coins to beat it?

name: Unbelievaboom!
description: This title is an explosive soccer shooter based on the concept that explosions are fun. Use bombs and exploding bullets to blow up your surroundings and aim for the goal! In this title, you can blow up not only enemies and balls, but also yourself, goal posts, and everything else!

name: The Parrot that Summons Demons
description:
Once the pet of an evil worshiper... Now adopted by an unlucky family!

The Parrot That Summons Demons is a family tragedy/horror FMV game featuring a surprisingly deep, dark and unsettling story by the creators of Bloody Service.

name: Stelloop
description:
Don't let the Moon get destroyed! A Horde Survival Roguelite in which you play as a witch, continuously orbiting the moon, while you as the player play out different cards to keep the moon alive and the enemies away!

Play different weapon cards, destroy cards to gain more stars, or fuse cards together to create even stronger cards! Do what you can to keep the enemies away for as long as you can, but don't be fooled, there is no winning in this rather laid back arena survival game.

name: NO: Never Outside
description: A graphical text adventure for the C64 based loosely on the sci-fi series 'V'.

name: Elevated Dread
description: Elevated Dread is a tense and atmospheric first person indie horror adventure where a kid attempts to put up flyers in a squalid apartment block.

name: Doctor Who: The Last Dalek
description:
Based on the 2005 episode of Doctor Who "Dalek", The Last Dalek is a browser game where you play as a Dalek trying to escape the vault.
Throughout each level of the game, you slowly reacquire your abilities in preparation for facing the Doctor at the end of the game.
Developed by New Media Collective.

name: μ
description: μ is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Hervest, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Zavas
description:
Described by its developers as a "New Type Role-Playing Game", Zavas differs from the Japanese-made RPGs by resembling a Western-style RPG, in particular the Ultima games of its time. Retaining the characteristically Japanese manga/anime aesthetics in graphics, Zavas has little resemblance to Japanese RPGs in other aspects. It is not story- and character-driven; the player controls a knight named Mardy in the medieval fantasy land of Fargana (with slight Middle Eastern influences), and is free to go anywhere, exploring the world without following a set storyline. The top-down world consists of vast wilderness areas and towns.

Similarity to Western RPGs is evident in detailed management of player-controlled party (NPCs with names and portraits, but little personality can be found and recruited). beside the usual weapon, armor, and item management, the player must also buy food to keep his characters alive. Some of the interaction with NPCs offers choices (for example, paying money or attacking a guard who demands toll to enter a city). The enemies appear randomly. The turn-based combat is very similar to that of Ultima games, with characters freely moving around a fixed battle screen.

name: Zavas II: The Prophecy of Mehitae
description:
The follow-up to Zavas is, like its predecessor, a fantasy role-playing game with Japanese anime-like aesthetics, but more Western-oriented free-form gameplay with more emphasis on character development than on a character-driven plot. Through a series of choices the player make the protagonist (always named Majon, but with different family names) to be a prince, the son of a merchant, or the son of a fisherman. In the beginning the player character undergoes a series of trials (which may include arcade-style mini-games, mathematical tasks, etc.) which determine his eventual attributes and also follow his growth until he turns sixteen and embarks on a quest to find companions and defeat an evil sorcerer in accordance with an ancient prophecy.

Though the game has a traditional overworld with towns, hostile areas, and fairly simple turn-based battles, many of its gameplay features deviate from the standard Japanese template. Every NPC can be approached with different attitudes (including bribe and usage of items), and often a specific attitude is needed to further the hero's goals. Money can be earned and managed through various activities. Experience points are awarded for conversations and other actions besides combat. An important factor is the party's stamina: a certain amount of it must be reached in order to access key plot-advancing locations, and building up stamina through side quests and other actions occupies a considerable portion of the gameplay. The protagonist has a ship at his disposal from the beginning of the game, and it is possible to physically sail across the sea and access any location, provided the stamina level is high enough.

name: Zatsugaku Olympic Watanabe Wataru-Hen
description: Zatsugaku Olympic Watanabe Wataru-Hen is a Quiz game, developed and published by Hard, which was released in Japan in 1988.

name: Yuuwaku
description: One day a young woman comes to the detective office and asks to find a picture that was left by her father. Hero rejects the request at first, but decides to look into it eventually. He starts to gather information about client's family with the neighborhood. Game is based on adult manga work and all information gathering happens through the sex.

name: Yuuwaku no Toiki
description: Tetsuya is a 4th grade college student who takes up a part-time job to tutor one of the daughters of a famous novelist in his mansion. But for a salary of 1 million yen per month he also agrees to serve as bodyguard to novelist's wife Ayako whose life is endangered by an unknown person.

name: Bazooka Bois
description:
A web3 2d shooter about having a blast blasting your friends with bazookas of all kinds.
No problem is too big for bazookas, if you are missing spice in your love life, add eggplant bazookas to it, if you are missing your marriage anniversary add bouquet bazookas to it, if you're missing gangsta rap, ain't nothing to it add bars bazookas to it.

name: Dante's Inferno: St. Lucia Edition
description:
The St. Lucia Edition is a “Game of the Year Edition” release and in addition to the game and manual the St. Lucia Edition includes the following:

exclusive artwork
The dark Forest DLC
Trials of St. Lucia DLC

This Version was only available in Italy.

name: Cocoro no Cocoron
description:
A Nintendo DS game developed by h.a.n.d. Inc. and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2011.

This is an adventure game where you play as Mirumiru, a little girl who found herself teleported to another planet called the Cocoron World.

name: Thy Flesh
description: Suddenly you find yourself standing right next to your car. Your head hurts and your ears ring. The front of your car is almost wrapped around a tree and there is smoke coming from the engine. You realize that you don't know what happened or where you are...

name: Timberlodge Inn
description:
On your way to Firemore you start feeling exhausted and dizzy. You decide you have to stop at the nearest motel to take some rest. Though what seemed as a quiet night at first quickly makes a turn to a hellish nightmare while you discover the unsettling and unnerving secrets of the town's past.

Welcome to Timberlodge Inn.

name: Time Thief
description: Time Travel is for all to enjoy and a company called Timeshare Travel allows people to go on time travelling holidays. The downside is that you have to use a year from your life and you do die younger but you will experience living that year you took from. Problems have started to arise that tourists are returning crippled or badly injured and your friend Jocasta, an academic suspects a Time Thief is responsible. Jocasta goes through time to search and confront the thief but doesn't return. It is up to you to travel in time now to find Jocasta and find and stop the Time Thief.

name: Our Shared Lie
description:
You are a wolf.

You wake up in a strange gravel-filled field on the massive edge of a cliff. Unable to remember anything, you accept the help of a mysterious, but kind and energetic lion. Now you know that you aren't alone and other seven people share your same state of mind. And none of you know where you are.

Explore a strange new (or familiar?) place surrounded by questions. Search for answers in the desolate facilities, learn the vast history of the world and find a way to escape in the process.

name: Toffee Trouble in Creamville
description: When the mayor leaves town and Toffee is in charge of Creamville, anything that can go wrong, will go wrong.

name: Devilish Valentine
description: Find differences in the pictures about Valentine's Day with the devil and angel.

name: Devilish Trick
description: A Halloween themed spot-the-difference game.

name: Devilish Christmas
description: Christmas themed spot the difference game.

name: Trapt
description:
A camera containing the last recording of a unknown missing person trapt within a sewer system has been recovered by the local police. Now you will have to relive the persons experience through the recording itself. See if you can alter the outcome.

TRAPT is a VHS aesthetic found footage cryptid horror experience that plays on realistic situations and claustrophobic environments with a deep atmosphere.

name: Bud Farm: Grass Roots
description: Bud Farm: Grass Roots is a wildly hilarious and quirky weed farming simulation that is free to download, and insanely fun to play. In this strange but wonderful idle simulation tap game, you start running your very own Idle weed business while working to manage and expand your farm.

name: A Date with Yesterday
description: Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Love and Job! Otona no Jijou
description: An otome game aimed to women aged 30 and older. The protagonist is supported by her three female friends during her job and romance troubles.

name: Matchbox: Emergency Patrol
description: You choose a Matchbox fire engine, police car, or ambulance and freely drive around a city completing missions such as putting out a fire, arresting a bank robber, or driving someone to the hospital. You have to complete each mission for each vehicle three times to complete the game. When you have completed half of the missions for each vehicle, the police car becomes a motorcycle and the ambulance and fire truck are enhanced.

name: Campus Romance 101
description:
Your college years are all about romance!
Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Pirates In Love
description: No longer available.

name: Pirates in Love: Captain's Cut
description:
A re-localized English version of the app using the original Japanese character names and unmodified artwork. The original localization was retired in 2018, and Captain's Cut was transferred into Voltage's Love 365 library app.

Set sail on a voyage of destiny! A twist of fate puts you aboard a pirate ship that’s off on the treasure-hunting adventure of a lifetime.

Where will your journey lead you? To untold riches or the sweet love of a swarthy pirate…?

name: Redriver 2
description: Redriver 2 is an unofficial PC port of the Driver 2, an open world car chase game. The game was known for pushing the limits of the PlayStation 1, resulting in performance and draw distance issues. These have been resolved in this port, along with fixes for long-standing bugs and other quality of life improvements.

name: Battle of Heroes: Land of Immortals
description: Sin descripción

name: Gumball Rainbow Ruckus
description: Sin descripción

name: Ben 10: Omniverse Undertown Chase
description: Sin descripción

name: Kitten Adventure: A Very Meow Christmas
description: A Very Meow Christmas is a truly incredible and epic game starring Lara Croft, who is asked to save kittens' most beloved holiday. Play minigames and bring back the magic of Christmas!

name: Nu, pogodi! Vypusk 1: Pogonya
description:
The wolf decides to take revenge on the Hare for all past grievances. However, the task is difficult: the unlucky predator will have to overcome a lot of obstacles and compete in strength and dexterity with the numerous friends of his main opponent. In the end, the poor fellow Wolf finds out what kind of monster is hiding in the skin of a "harmless" bunny. The game includes nine levels in the best traditions of the original cartoon "Just you wait!": TV center, city, museum, construction sites, park, stadium, village, beach.
The famous opponents of the Wolf are the Magician Cat, the Behemoth, the Rooster and other characters in the animated series.
Means of defense and attack - throwing stones and fisticuffs, in addition, the Wolf can jump from rooftop to rooftop and climb a rope.

name: Nu, pogodi! Vypusk 2: Kruglyj schet
description: Sin descripción

name: Nu, pogodi! Vypusk 4: Dogonyalki
description: A fun children's arcade invites you to take part in the adventures of the famous couple of mischievous people - the Wolf and the Hare. Players are waiting for eight exciting levels, each of which consists of several funny episodes. Several difficulty levels suitable for both beginners and experienced Hares. Passing the game, the guys will learn an exciting story with an unexpected ending.

name: Nu, pogodi! Vypusk 5: Po sledam zajca
description: Bully Wolf does not leave hope to catch the elusive Hare! Chasing him, the Wolf will rush through the streets and park alleys of animated Moscow, run into the stadium, where he will have to perform exercises on a variety of sports equipment, and in the end, even go out of town. Whether the hunt will succeed and whether the Wolf will be able to give a worthy rebuff to the numerous friends of the Hare depends on the player's ingenuity and speed of reaction.

name: Little Longnose
description: Sin descripción

name: Mortal Kombat: Defenders of the Earth
description:
MK Defenders of the Earth is a non-profit fan-game created by Daniloabella based on the classic games of the MK saga.

Powered on Mugen, this game uses Borg117's Season 2 Final (Patch 4) as the base and material of the MKP 4.1 by MKP Team.

name: War of the Worlds
description:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story, puzzles and mechanics.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2023.

name: Lights
description: Sin descripción

name: Illumina
description: Sin descripción

name: Mathica
description:
The small town of Numberville is under the curse of the late Professor Alfons Numerus - imprisoned in Number-Castle, Mathica, the stepdaughter of the mathematical genius, must solve the problem of squaring the circle, which her father failed.

The task is to redeem Mathica from the curse by finding the lost formula of Ramanujan, which proves the unsolvability of the problem and thus the futility of her arithmetic. Only in this way can the mind of Numerus acknowledge its lifelong error and find peace. Clues to the whereabouts of the formula can be found scattered throughout the city. Along the way, various mathematical puzzles must be solved, for example, to open locked doors. Thus, to free Mathica, certain mathematical knowledge about geometry, equations, numbers, probabilities and combinatorics is required, which can be acquired in the knowledge part of the game.

name: Super X-Day X: The New challengers
description: Fan game developed by Works&Trax, inspired in the original arcade game made by Namco.

name: CTGP-Universe
description: CTGP-Universe is a Mario Kart 8 modpack featuring custom tracks, custom Grand Prix icons, text edits, a new boot screen, new music for tracks and new menu screens.

name: Awkward 2
description: Awkward 2 is the adult multiplayer party game filled with dark, hilarious & sometimes downright disturbing questions. Laugh, debate, defend and find out things you never wanted to know about your friends and Twitch viewers!

name: Befuddle
description: Befuddle is a cozy multiplayer party game where players take turns decoding the addictive word puzzles of your favourite songs, books, films and video games! Deliberate, deduce and decipher the mixed up titles with your friends or Twitch viewers and see who’s the best Befuddler!

name: Towers Deck
description: Towers Deck is a mix between tower defense, deckbuilding and roguelike. Build towers use spell to defend the castle.

name: Game & Watch-e: Vermin
description: Cancelled port of Vermin (the original version) for the e-Reader.

name: Cohort Chess
description: Cohort Chess is a Board Game/Miscellaneous video game published by Cohort Studios released on July 6th, 2011 for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Game & Watch-e: Vermin
description: A cancelled port of Vermin (the 1997 remake) for the e-Reader.

name: Trailer Park Life
description: Build and manage your own trailer park to either become a peaceful haven or a pit of unruly partiers. Expand on services and amenities to keep tenants happy. Manage staff to keep your park safe and clean or let chaos run amuck and risk it all for higher gains.

name: Old Maid
description:
A timeless classic card game with a fun new look for the iPhone! Now with Game Center integration! We've added Game Statistics, Instructions, Awards and Leaderboards as well as several great new professions!
Hours of entertainment for kids and adults. Colorful, filled with zany characters, easy to play. Pick cards and match pairs, but don't get stuck with the Old Maid!

name: Game & Watch-e: Spitball Sparky
description: A cancelled port of Spitball Sparky for the e-Reader.

name: Rapid Rocket
description: Feel like a challenge? Guide the rocket through the rocks in this amazing, fast-paced and exciting game.

name: Game & Watch-e: Octopus
description: A cancelled port of Octopus for the e-Reader.

name: Word Trails
description:
Discover a world of sumptuous semantics, luxurious literacy and phonological freshness in Word Trails, a word-building game for the grammatically gifted and non-gifted alike.
By creating a trail of words you’ll traverse a world of mysterious islands and explore new modes of letter-hunting in tranquil and natural settings.
Where will the trail lead you? Start your journey today!

name: Kombo
description: Kombo – Word Trivia Game is a fun game that lets you play with words and letters. It is a complete learning with fun game which mixes crosswords, anagrams, trivia and word puzzle. You get hints that describe the word. Just guess the correct word and keep learning to keep scoring. The hint also includes the number of letters the word has to help you guess the words and make the right guess. The combination of letters are also provided but with a twist. All the combination are jumbled. You need to join the combination of letters to guess the correct word. Interesting thing is as you keep guessing the words, it becomes even more easier to guess other words that follow.

name: I Hate Zombies
description: Sin descripción

description: A cancelled port of Octopus (the 1997 remake) for the e-Reader.

description: A cancelled port of Fire for the e-Reader.

name: Game & Watch-e: Fire
description: A cancelled port of Fire (the 1997 remake) for the e-Reader.

name: Magic Fantasy
description: Sin descripción

name: Real Baseball 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Crazy Golf Cat
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Tangle
description: Sin descripción

name: Tales of Demons and Gods
description: Sin descripción

name: Game & Watch-e: Manhole
description: A cancelled remake of Manhole meant to be released for the e-Reader. It was represented by a white Luigi on the package of the cancelled Game & Watch-e Collection. It was one of the games in the Collector Version.

name: Hikkonuki Pikmin
description: An e-Reader game released as add-on for Pikmin 2.

name: Tekuteku Pikmin
description:
Tekuteku Pikmin (literally Marching Pikmin) is an e-Reader application from the Pikmin Puzzle Cards-e series, requiring an e-Reader, Game Boy Advance, Nintendo GameCube Game Boy Advance Cable, and a Japanese Nintendo GameCube with Pikmin 2.

It is a grid-based puzzle game, where the player must control several Pikmin to reach treasure. Since all Pikmin move at once, strategy is required to get all the Pikmin to the treasure.

name: Tsunagete Pikmin
description: Sin descripción

name: Robin Hood
description: Sin descripción

name: Vampirix
description: Vampirix is a multiplayer casual real time strategy game developed in real Transylvania. It's an old school like game, with build and fight strategies, with resources, armies and economy.

name: Nikki no Tabisuru Quiz
description: Nikki no Tabisuru Quiz was a Japanese only Club Nintendo game which quizzed users about their knowledge on Japan which 3DS users could download

name: Music Inc
description: Music Inc - a game that allows you to envelop yourself in the world of music production.

name: Cute Chaos Demon Nyanbaba
description:
The super cute villain Nyanbaba is back again! This time, meow bully invaded 10 new scenes, found all the strange hidden points and cracked the magic of cat ear Nyanbaba!
Contains jump out shock (cute)! And super cute Chinese dubbing! More scenes, more voice, more joy!

name: SteamWorld Build
description: In SteamWorld Build, you must escape a dying planet by building a mining town to dig up vital long-lost technology. Meet the ever-growing needs of your citizens, trade resources and defend your mine from the creatures that lurk below.

name: Lobotomy Corporation Wonder Lab Mod
description: A mod for Lobotomy Corporation that adds new abnormalities and E.G.O from the Official Wonder Lab comic by Project Moon

name: Drive Time Radio
description: Drive Time Radio is a 20 minute narrative game.

name: The Walking Fish
description:
The factory in the rural village of Fisherman Hills has been shut down due to mysterious reasons. Speculations from the local townsfolk suggest it might have something to do with some kind of disease... however nobody is quite sure.

What's really going on in the factory? Let's find out, and perhaps see if something can be done to stop it.

name: Fish RPG
description: Fish RPG borrows gameplay elements from The Walking Fish, a game the pioneered the world of fish gaming.

name: Lost Between
description: A girl who lost her memory woke up after a nightmare, looking for her parents to find she lives in another nightmare, kill enemies, solve puzzles, use the environment for your advantage, explore endless clues , search your way to survive the nightmare and find your parent and your peace.

name: Deadly Desire
description: An FPS shooter story game set in the Haluwa at the beginning of the Calculus pandemic. Answering the question "What if they were right?"

name: Jungle Bomb Fever
description: Kinshen Island was captured by a large army of the enemy. Strategically important object was tasked with freeing the best squad you ever led.

name: Easy Game
description: Easy Game is a platformer game that breaks through the stage to avoid obstacles by stepping on the treadmill. The player aims to avoid various obstacles in the game and finally catch the boss monster.

name: Synthetic Days
description: Sin descripción

name: Candy Arkanoid
description: Candy Arkanoid is more than just a simple arcade game - it also includes role-playing elements, allowing players to level up their candy Arkanoid and customize its abilities So why wait? Satisfy your sweet tooth and soon blast your way through the candy cosmos!

name: Void Rifter XR
description: High speed dynamic multiplayer mech boomer shooter with full mech customization!

name: Kitchen Chaos
description: The customers are hungry, it's up to you to fill them up!

name: Diesel the Pug Warrior
description: Help Diesel as he joins forces with his best friend Fred, as they try to save the Kingdom of Everlyn from the evil Luna and bring peace to the land once more in this adventure RPG!

name: Back Rank Chess
description: Do you like the Endgame in chess? Here's a brand new chess variant! Defend the back rank against the onslaught of enemy pawns. Easy to learn , advanced artificial intelligence , 76 hand-crafted stages.

name: Finding America: The Pacific Northwest
description: Explore the Pacific Northwest!

name: Haunted Hotel: Personal Nightmare - Collector's Edition
description: After 20 years, you receive a letter about your missing mom and sister. Answers are waiting at the Freedom Hotel, but nothing there is quite as it seems. Can you overcome your deepest fears and save your family in time?

name: Deep in the Snowy Night
description: A challenging, winter-themed horror experience

name: TeamPunk
description: A steampunk twinstick shooter where you and your team need to work together to protect the Convoy.

name: Finding Xavier
description: A short adventure in which you will have to use precise platforming in order to find your cat, Xavier.

name: Taste of War
description: Taste of War - is a hardcore 3D shooter with surviving elements where you play as the last survived soldier against different Kiborgs.

name: The King's Feast
description: Take hold of the King's Sword and its path as it flies through a bustling and grand feast. Choose to go the distance or smite as many of King's conspirators as possible! No matter which you choose, there will be total chaos. Go forth, and make it a feast to remember!

name: Meka Sigurat
description: A hardcore, mechanically deranged wave shooter! Shoot robots to your hearts content! Collect items! Upgrade yourself! Deny any meaning whatsoever!

name: Killfest
description: Killfest is a fast-paced arcade FPS that fuels your adrenaline rush! Shoot and slice your way through the pit by yourself or with friends! Think fast and coordinate your assault as you progress though waves of unique and challenging foes.

name: The Secret Ops
description: You just finished a secret mission, but there was an accident in the headquarters you belong to. You are now an experienced agent who will solve the leak crisis at the headquarters. Here you'll encounter a variety of enemies, they can be stupid, but some are also very cunning. Well, good luck.

name: Safehouse
description: In Safehouse, play as a member of a criminal crew holed up in a Safehouse with a traitor among you working with the enemy to bring you down. Can you uncover their identity and eliminate them before they betray the crew?

name: Adventurer Flower
description: You're a flower in an office and there are three hidden games based on balance and memory challenges in there.

name: Wojak Rush
description: Are you ready to embark on a relentless struggle to wake the Wojak, who has had a strange dream, from his dream? Wojak Rush is a cartoon themed adventure game that combines parkour and rogue-like game mechanics that you will use against hundreds of monsters that come upon you.

name: Fantasya
description: The planet of Fantasya is in crisis from Planet Eater. Let's save the planet Fantasya by dispatching a commando from the planet Ndev, a planetary protection agency. Character defense using cute SD characters, choose the skills the characters have to your liking and unfold various tactics.

name: Dark Night Maze
description: "Dark Night Maze" is a very challenging maze adventure game, the biggest feature of the game is super difficult to clear the level, players need to collect various equipment, improve their abilities, find the exit to win.

name: Dungeon Survive
description: Dungeon Survive is a roguelike survival game, You can choose different weapons and specialized skills, Make each weapon have a different play experience. Try to survive in the monster pack with specialized weapons! Also, how many seconds can you live in the endgame?

name: Alien Battlefield
description: The game includes real-time strategic mode and chess mode. In real-time strategic mode, the units that the game can unlock are related to the player's upgrade route. In the chess mode, units will automatically attack the opponent until the winner is determined.

name: Disgusting Puzzle 2
description: Disgusting Puzzle 2 is a puzzle game designed for persons over 18 years old. The game is very simple, you have to collect a picture, which consists of 20 elements. With successful assembly a button will appear with the transition to the next level.

name: Mage Ball
description: Explore extraordinary magical dimensions in 3D graphics. Avoid traps, chasms, collect magic potions and solve puzzles. Find your way out by jumping on asteroid belts, moving platforms, rolling through tunnels and slides, using magical portals. Prove you're not the worst mage in the guild.

name: El Ne Rue
description: El Ne Rue is a simple pixel game where you take control of the witch Lumstea and walk around, exploring the ruins of a city mostly submerged in water.

name: Mikrocosmos
description: This is a party game that combines trading and action elements. Your goal is to establish good trading "affinities" with planets through trading. Of course, your competitors won't let you easily grab a whole piece of cake. Burning, killing, and snatching...? Perhaps inevitable!

name: SO-108
description: Work, eat and survive. In a dystopian future where corporations make the rules of society, SO-108 needs to earn money to survive, until a strange phenomenon happens and completely turns his life around.

name: Flaming Thunderer
description: Flaming Thunderer is an action-platformer with adventure elements. Darkness has overtaken your village, monsters have come to your lands.

name: Lone Traveler
description: Lone Traveler - A story about a lone traveler, you have to dig, explore the location, fight monsters in order to survive on the island! Build a wooden ax or a stone pickaxe and go on an adventure!

name: Crime Scene
description: You have to play for an ordinary guy who does a specific job. Your work is connected with crime, blood and death.

name: BBirthday
description: Help Bianca to relive the 15 years of her life, but from another perspective ️. Enjoy this dreamcore style visual novel with escape room elements and hints of horror. Unlock different endings. ✨

name: Droid Wars: Duel
description: Sci-Fi Arcade Old-Style PvP ! No multiplayer, matchmaking, lobby waiting...just pure fun with your friends. Choose your nicks, gender, equip and head on to excitement. Sure, there is lot more to it, you'll find out eventually...welcome !

name: Stella's Pointless Castle Awakening
description: A female knight, her spear, her lamp and a mysterious castle. An exciting adventure awaits ahead! Stella's Pointless Castle Awakening is a 3rd-person puzzle adventure with a slice of arcade flavour.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Atlantis
description: Plunge into a lush underwater paradise teeming with life: the lost city of Atlantis where you'll discover a serene yet challenging mini golf course like no other known to man or the gods. Escape to a mystical realm among majestic sea creatures, spectacular aquatic flora, hidden treasures, and more.

name: Mama Die and Retry
description: Mama Die and Retry is an old school action platformer that offers a challenging experience through 26 levels and 4 bosses. Fight with a working class hero and discover new horizons filled with a lot of aliens and threats. Use your broom against them. Each time you die, you will retry.

name: Truck Simulator Ultimate 3D
description: Complete all truck game missions as a good truck driver in the city.

name: The Justitia Files
description: Sophie Aleth is the latest hire at Justitia Consultants, a firm that handles other companies' problems discreetly and with professionalism. This game covers theories and concepts of the business world through the lens of an interactive story.

name: Twinkle Hunter
description: Twinkle Hunter is a 2D action game focused on boss battles. Become a hunter whose teddy bear was stolen by the great villain 'Twinkle Theives', and experience journey to retrieve the teddy bear. Can you hunt the thieves who attack you in various ways and rescue the teddy bear 'Mari'?

name: Torrential
description: Prepare yourself for a bit of a challenge. Simple but difficult bullet hell, semi-similar to the classics with modernized controls. Cuts to the chase with only boss levels, no filler in between, just a torrent of bullets.

name: Rope Bowling
description: Ready to mix physics with gravity? We are glad to present you Rope Bowling...

name: Objector
description: In Objector, you play as an enemy of the king. Join the history of opposition against ruthless power in a diverse fantasy world by facing difficulties and beating bosses waiting for you in challenging gameplay.

name: SokoChess White
description: SokoChess White is a puzzle game about pushing Chess pieces into their destination and overcoming various obstacles. Enjoy 70 different handcrafted levels with a unique twist on the Chess formula.

name: Tebb And The Chistorbes
description: ¡Alguien le robo el rostro a todos! Juego de plataformas 2d lineal, muchos checkpoints, no necesitas googlear. Tebb se encuentra con la misión de encontrar los 100 chistorbes para recuperar el rostro de todo el mundo. Controles simples: Moverse, correr y saltar.

name: A Legend of Wisdom
description: Enter the fantasy world and feel what it's like to be a real traveler! Create, try new spells and face the greatest evil in this world!

name: Per Aspera: Home
description: This journey is not over yet, we have much more to do!

name: Pretty Overseer
description: Pretty Overseer is an animated romantic dating simulator in the anime style. You are a young lieutenant overseeing the correction of magically talented individuals in the closed and isolated complex of the military Academy. Your main task is to maintain order and train recruits.

name: The Rocket Jumper
description: The Rocket Jumper is a 3D platformer that puts a twist on traditional gameplay by incorporating rocket jumping as the main element.

name: The Whisper Soul
description: Game genre: exploration puzzle, escape room Gameplay: Players change the season of the room through the "time infection" system to find the key to escape.

name: Dardeep
description: A brave miner falls into an endless stone cave, taking with him only a pickaxe. The only chance to survive is is to dig and find keys to locked doors.

name: Torico's B-day Gift Hunt
description: Torico's b-day gift hunt - Toriko slept peacefully, looking forward to the upcoming party on her birthday, but bad luck - all the gifts were stolen! Restore justice and return the gifts to their place in this game inspired by the classic platformers of the 90s!

name: Aashaa
description: A quick atmospheric 2D precision platformer taking place in Medieval India where the player must take back the throne. Repeatedly dying and finding game breaking exploits is heavily encouraged in this short indie title.

name: BoomSweeper VR
description: Hands > Mice! BoomSweeperVR is a classic puzzle game re-imagined from a whole new perspective. Sit back, kick your feet up, and unwind with one of the most addictive and beloved games of all time. Featuring achievements and three levels of difficulty for newcomers and 90's desktop veterans.

name: Fingers' Dating
description: It's the happiest thing to do on a date with a girl, but maybe it's just you tonight.

name: Stream Runners: Heroes
description: Stream Runners: Heroes is a retro style idle game for live streamers to play with their viewers on Twitch. Players can add Runners to the game using channel points on stream to fight enemies, earn points for their lane, and defeat bosses. There are many ways to use this game with your community, it's all up to you and your chat!

name: Hard Survivor
description: Hard Survivor - An unusual adventure inspired by classic games from the NES console welcomes you! Explore numerous levels and collect all the coins on your way to victory!

name: Soul's Spectrum
description: Immerse yourself in this dark fantasy adventure where death is not the end but an incentive to keep going: several puzzles await you while a unique story will slowly unfold as you explore this mysterious supernatural place.

name: Qdice
description: A turn-based multiplayer strategy boardgame

name: Caves of Lore
description: Engage in tactical grid-based combat in this classic-styled fantasy CRPG.

name: Torch
description: Jump, transform and triumph over your opponents in an insane climb in Torch the elements platform game !

name: Chex
description: Chex is a strategic board game currently based on Gliński's hexagonal variant of chess. Players must use their pieces to capture their opponent's king. The hexagonal board introduces new challenges and opportunities.

name: Rabbit Hole: Chapter 1
description: An ancient evil has descended upon the rural town of Rabbit Hole. Now Shaun Turner not only has to untangle a twisted web of supernatural events and mysteries to save his family but also escape from the hellish remains of his hometown.

name: Survivor: Stay in the Light
description: Stay in the light, hunt the dark. Create your own hero through the four dimensions of role, skill, talent, and blessing outside the battle. In the battle, choose the most suitable equipment and weapons strategically to improve your strength and continue to fight.

name: Domination: War of Nations
description: This is an online turn-based board game in which each player will need to eliminate their opponents in order to conquer territories and clear the way to win the game.

name: Starlite: Defender of Justice Ultimate HD Edition
description: In the year 2170 an alien threat known as the CYRONS invaded the planet Earth with intent of hostile takeover. Play as "AGENT 69" in the this fast paced Cyberpunk, Hack and Slash action game!

name: Loot Box Simulator: Crimson Fire
description: Be rich for once and buy all the loot boxes. Earn gold and spend it on awesome loot boxes filled with more tahn 1.000 amazing rewards.

name: Loot Box Simulator: Heroes of the Dark Age
description:
Be rich for once and buy all the loot boxes.
Earn gold and spend it on awesome loot boxes filled with amazing pictures of anime girls. It's simple, yet addicting.

name: Haunted Zombie Slaughter
description: A single play TOP DOWN game with a story about escaping zombies to survive! Do a battle and play with each other for up to maximum 2 people!

name: Demon Hunter: New Chapter
description:
"Twenty years of peace came to an abrupt end, when Dawn Harlock, the last member of the mysterious order of demon hunters, has to, once again, face Archdemon Ragnar and save the world from evil.
One day she recieves a call from mysterious doctor Stuart Williams, who claims to be her foster father's long time friend. He promises valuable information about Dawn's biological parents, that might shed some light on her eerie past shrouded in mystery."

name: Beach Cafe: Caribbean Sand
description: Follow the clues of your grandfather's disappearance and unveil all the mysteries hidden in this abandoned place. Will you be able to find out what happened?

name: Through the Years
description: Are you ready for a survival adventure of your lifetime?

name: Santa Claus Goblins Attack
description: Help Santa Claus save Christmas from the terrible Goblins.

name: Arcade Machine: Clown Hunt
description: New Arcade Machine for 1 or 2 players! Hunt for the clowns is wild! Hop in for a rollercoaster of action!

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot + A New Power Awakens Set - Legendary Edition
description:
Play through iconic Dragon Ball Z battles on a scale unlike any other. Fight across vast battlefields with destructible environments and experience epic boss battles against the most iconic foes (Raditz, Frieza, Cell, etc.). Increase your power level through RPG mechanics and rise to the challenge!

Go beyond the history of Dragon Ball Z and experience 2 additional boss battles, with the New Power Awakens set! Master the power of the gods to challenge Lord Beerus and go even beyond to fight Golden Frieza with the power of Super Saiyan Blue!

name: Party Party Time + Party Harder Pack
description:
10 brand new head-to-head mini games! Get the gang together and keep the party going!

The Party Harder Pack includes the following content:

10 New Minigames:
- Twirling Disks
- Robot Watch
- Go Go Race
- Conveyor Run
- Punch Fighter
- Boot the Bomb
- Air Hockey Rumble
- Block Slicer
- Escape Zone
- Labyrinth Escape

name: That's a Cow: Deluxe Edition
description: Soar through the air and don't get milked in this cute game. With this bundle you get a new headgear - an eggshell.

name: Mojito the Cat: Extended Edition
description: Roll into action in this quirky puzzle game. Travel the world alongside an adorable cat named Mojito or some of his new friends.

name: Mischief Dungeon Life: Isekai Tensei shita Ore no Itazura Dungeon Life - Clara Edition
description: After an accident, Renji was reborn in another world as a "shapeshifter," a demon that can transform at will. He was reborn in a dungeon inhabited by demons… Using new demon powers, a thrilling and exciting life in the mischief dungeon begins…!

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Complete Edition
description: Pull out weeds, plant new apple trees and gather the fruits of your labor. This bundle includes various Halloween-themed items and the Chicken House.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Complete Edition
description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Complete Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks.

name: Kindergarten: Buddy Edition
description: Uncover a grand conspiracy by living the same day over and over again. With the power of friendship, excessive violence, and nuggets, you will discover the truth.

name: Party Party Time: Party Harder Pack
description: The party's just getting started! Enjoy 10 new minigames! New downloadable content (Party Harder Pack) is coming to Party Party Time! 10 brand new head-to-head minigames! Get the gang together and keep the party going!

name: That's a Cow: Eggshell
description: Fly through levels with your new eggshell.

name: Daily Dadish
description: It’s an adventure that lasts a whole year! Daily Dadish is a retro platformer that features over 365 handcrafted levels - one for every day of the year! Face challenging foes, unlock cool characters, and help reunite Dadish with his missing kids all over again!

name: Garden of Pets
description: Experience the joy of caring for your own virtual pet in the beautiful world of Garden of Pets!

name: Syndrome: Extended Edition
description: Explore the doomed starship Valkenburg and save yourself. Syndrome is a sci-fi horror experience with a simple goal. Stay in the shadows and survive!

name: The Preschoolers: Season 1 - Extended Edition
description: Join the Preschoolers on a heartwarming visit to the ZOO and learn why even rowdy monkeys and huge bears need a little peace and quiet. Watch them play around with snowballs and enjoy the boons of winter.

name: Hippo: Little Red Riding Hood
description:
Funny stories for children about the fascinating adventures of the Hippo. Visit the magical world of Little Red Riding Hood with Hippo and save her Grandma from an angry Dragon. Fun tasks and colorful puzzles with coloring for kids are waiting for you!

An old well-known fairy tale has been transformed and has become a modern story about a red bandana. The main villain will be an evil Green Dragon, not the old-fashioned Grey Wolf. And who is this modern Red Riding Hood? Of course this is our beloved Hippo!

name: Active DBG: Brave's Rage
description: Brave's Rage is a roguelite deckbuilding game with a twist.

name: Radiant Flux: Hyperfractal 4.0
description: Can you find all the secrets in this desktop hacking simulator?

name: Handshakes: Hands On
description: Handshakes: Hands On is the follow up to Handshakes, the sokoban puzzler about shaking hands. Take your brain for a stroll with all new mechanics, non-linear progression, community level editor and more.

name: Not those monsters again...
description: Shoot'em up for Playdate

name: LizardSpock
description: Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock

name: Q.U.B.E. 2: Ultimate Edition
description: Includes ALL downloadable content for Q.U.B.E. 2: Classic Gloves, Lost Orbit, Aftermath. In Q.U.B.E. 2 you play as Amelia Cross, an archaeologist who has awoken among the ruins of an alien landscape. With the distant help of another survivor you must manipulate the structure of this mysterious world and find a way back home. As you explore and solve puzzles to progress, thought-provoking questions about your true purpose and the origins of the structure you are navigating will need to be considered, forcing you to come to terms with a devastating truth that will shake your world.

name: The Catch: Carp & Coarse - Deluxe Edition
description: The deluxe version of The Catch: Carp & Coarse gives you the fantastic core game as well as the exciting additional venue, Jezioro Bestii for one great price!

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - Deluxe Edition
description: The officially licensed multiplayer version of the classic fantasy adventure board game, Talisman. On your travels, you will need strength, courage and some good dice rolls to survive the dangers you face and beat your opponents to the centre of the board!

name: Demonic Tales Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:
- Demon Hunter: New Chapter
- 9 Clues: The Secret of Serpent Creek
- The Secret Order: Return to the Buried Kingdom

name: Primal Hunt
description:
You are invited to the greatest Hunt in history! Journey through prehistoric biomes, tracking down and going one-on-one with the most dangerous creatures to have ever walked the earth, DINOSAURS. Face the ferocity of a pack of Raptors, the strength, and power of an eight-ton Triceratops, or the terror of a 30-ft Tyrannosaurus Rex.
With an arsenal of high-tech weapons and armor at your disposal, you are poised to become the ultimate hunter…if you can survive. As you master each hunt, your prey becomes more dangerous as they are upgraded with advanced cybernetic enhancements, equipped with armor, carbine machine guns, rocket launchers, and the lethal ion cannon.
Rise to the challenge! Face the danger of putting yourself in the path of nature’s most feared creatures, risk everything for the ultimate thrill, and flirt with immortality to secure your place in history as the greatest hunter to have ever lived.

name: The Zebra Z
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Eat grass with the main hero of the game The Zebra Z and eat all the grass in the world!

name: Flipy
description: Flipy is chilling game with Christmas atmosphere. Your goal is to stack as many blocks on top of each other as you can to achieve the highest possible score. Good Luck!

name: Skew
description: A spin-off based on The Last Worker, Skew is a realtime 3D endless spinner starring the robot voiced by Jason Isaacs.

name: Imposters: Countdown
description: Complete tasks & mini-games. Report bodies. Call voting sessions. Hack the station. Overload the reactor. Betray your friends. An online party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-12 players...in third person! Escape the ship before the countdown runs out! Don't get fooled by the rogue AI.

name: Dota
description:
In the near-future, a scientist experiments with creating life using a secret scroll found in Tibetan ruins. He accidentally revives an ancient bio-weapon that quickly captures him & his family, except their plucky son Dota. Explore multiple zones full of monsters, gadgets, & hazards to help Dota defeat bosses and save his family from this resurrected monstrosity.

With various weapons & power-ups, you must increase your health & toolset in this dungeon crawling action-platformer. A Family Computer port was planned & advertised through 1987, but ultimately cancelled. The PC versions are officially available today via Project EGG.

name: After L!fe: The Sacred Kaleidoscope
description: A mobile gacha simulation game with RPG and otome elements. Manage 20 Soul Reapers, learn their backstories, and help them purify vengeful spirits.

name: Super Doll Rika-chan: Kisekae Daisakusen
description: Sin descripción

name: Sapu
description: Sapu is a young frog who lives in the frog village located in the frog forest. On a beautiful Tuesday afternoon Sapu is awakened by other villagers, informing him that his grandfather had been bitten by a poisonous carnivorous plant while catching fireflies for dinner, and that he was on the brink of death. Sapu despairs but soon has an idea of how to save his grandfather and goes on an adventure in the forest.

name: Night Flight
description:
Night Flight is a Pokémon e-Reader game for the Game Boy Advance. In order to play Night Flight, two Pokémon Skyridge e-Reader cards must be scanned. The required cards are: Zubat (#117) and Golbat (#60).

In Night Flight the player controls a Zubat which must eat as much food as possible. If the player runs into a Koffing three times then the game is over. The Koffing are invisible unless the player uses Zubat's supersonic sound waves.

name: Car For Sale Simulator 2023
description: Car for sale simulator 2023 game in detail, you can buy and sell vehicles in the town and you can sell more vehicles by establishing a vehicle gallery and developing your company.

name: WWE 2K23
description: WWE 2K23 is Even Stronger with expanded features, gorgeous graphics and a deep roster of WWE Superstars and Legends. 2K Showcase returns as an interactive sports documentary focusing on the 20-year career of John Cena and WarGames is finally here!

name: Lair of Goblins
description: Casual action roguelike.

name: Military Enlistment Office Escape Simulator
description: Military Enlistment Office Escape Simulator is a game that requires you to do everything you can to escape from those who are knocking on the door at the most inconvenient moment! Starring Vovochka, who suddenly knocked on the door. Open the door or not, the choice is yours!

name: Nurtured Human Plan: Meet a Date
description: Pixel beauty girl love raising game！Let's take it as the author's personal delusion!

name: BraverBots
description: BraverBots is a turn-based strategy game like no other. Assemble a team from your fleet of Bots, battle and defeat opponents in short online matches, and become champion of the Galactic Bots League.

name: Stay Human
description: Explore a hex based procedurally generated cityscape, infested with assorted zombies, collect powerful and novel zombie slaying weapons, medical supplies and food. Rescue fellow survivors to grow your party, defeat powerful zombie bosses, escape the city... but most importantly... Stay Human!

name: Project: Summer Ice - Pinball: Jane
description: A game in the "Project: Summer Ice" series focusing on Jane.

name: ChikuTaku
description: This is a short rhythm game based on the first single by Watson Amelia of hololive English -Myth-. Enjoy the journey of hololive's No.1 detective as she traverses through various time periods of the past and future in a fun musical adventure!

name: Pocket Player: Pac-Man
description: 3 fun games - PAC-MAN, PAC-MANIA and PAC-PANIC

name: Sonic Putter
description: Sonic Putter is a mobile phone game released for i-mode 90x devices by DoCoMo.

name: Worry_Bead
description: Restful, Relaxing, Fun at a low, low price. Flip, Spin or Fiddle the Beads in manner that suits you. Use a two finger motion to set the bead size. This sole use or "pass around on a single device" game will show at least one virtual bead that the user can fiddle with single finger actions. There will be more beads on devices with larger screens. There is no demand to move fast or slow, so the APP could be used to burn off excess energy or stress. As a game, multiple users can pass the device around and try to mimic the bead arrangement on the other tab. The APP could also be used as a dexterity test, where someone would make requested changes to all the beads within a certain time.

name: Zombie Brains
description: Help the hungriest zombie on the app store by dodge, jump and swiping your way to freedom.

name: Zombie Smasher
description:
Zombie Smasher is the #1 addicting and entertaining game available on Apple Store.
Get ready to defend your home as a mob of zombies is about to invade you. Use your finger to tap on the zombies to smash and eliminate them before they pass your screen.

name: Sonic Slider
description: Sonic Slider is an online Flash game published on the 4Kids TV website by 4Kids Entertainment in January 2005 to promote the then-airing anime series, Sonic X. It is a Sonic-themed sliding puzzle.

name: Wild Wolf Family Simulator 3D
description: Ready to attack with pounce as a wild wolf in this wolf simulator. Go around big fantasy jungle and attack viciously by using your sharp claws and sensitive ears to navigate the prey in this low poly game with your ultimate wolf. Leading a family pack of cubs and a mate, your job is to protect and feed them. Start battle in high resolution forest as an arctic wolf also with wild wolf sim. Play this wild life game with multiple wolf quests in best 3D wolf game. Wolf simulator games to raise a family were never been so thrilling. Most wanted fantasy story of ultimate wolf is here. Play as realistic wild wolf and survive in the wilderness of forest with our Wild Wolf Family Simulator 3D.

name: Willy's Wonderland
description:
Welcome to Willy's Wonderland! But something isn't quite right...
Join the Janitor and Liv to battle it out and free the place from Willy and his henchmen!

name: Winner's Soccer Evolution
description: Winner’s Soccer 2014 is a real 3D competitive football game. It includes the teams and the latest football players’ data of 2014 World Cup. There are various modes for you to select, such as Cup, League Match and Friendly Match. It has up to 126 teams and 2600 players. Smooth actions and playback function let you feel like you actually in the game.

name: Wonder Wheel
description:
Discover the Wonders of the Wheel! Each Wonder contains three images which, when combined correctly, reveal a movie, artist or famous person.
A British flag? A knee? Some old spears? Brit.. knee.. spears..
To master the Wonder Wheel you'll need to solve cryptic clues, use phonetic phrases and twist your tongue. Can you solve them all and discover all the Wonders?

name: Word Adventure
description:
If you like word games, you have to take a look at Word Adventure. It's a brand new kind of Word Game!
Join us in this exciting adventure spanning through many different fantasy worlds. Travel through magical lands, visit amazing places and meet all kinds of cute creatures along the way.
Word Adventure is a single player word game that combines puzzle elements with a word game. You tap squares of letters to create words, but what really makes it stand out from other similar games is the possibility to move letters horizontally & vertically. You have never seen anything like this before, brand new gameplay mechanism!

name: Word Boxing
description: Improve your reaction speed and basic knowledge!

name: Word Safe
description:
Love word games, but bored with Boggle clones? Give Word Safe a try, it is a simple but addictive game of combining letters to make words. Instead of using the typical grid of letters, use the combination lock to make as many words as possible.
Words must be at least 3 letters long. Longer words are worth more points than short words so plan accordingly.

name: Wordgraphy
description: Wordgraphy is a new word game experience that limits your possible moves with letter groups to push you to think different words.

name: Worded!
description:
Worded! is a fun new word game that is easy to learn and challenging to master. If you like word games then you will love this amazing indie game. It combines word search with board and tile spelling games and real world physics to create a unique and entertaining word game experience.
You select the letters that can spell a word and then you arrange them into the word that you want to spell. More tiles will fall with each word that you find so your words must be long enough to prevent the board from filling up. Earn coins by finding longer words with rarer letters to buy powerups that destroy tiles and help you find even longer words.

name: Word Choices
description:
Have you ever thought about what it would be like to have all your favorite and new word games at one place? Well! Look no further.
Word Choices offers a collection of the best of Word Searching, Crosswords, Anagram & Picture crossword games. Find the hidden words, test your vocabulary, spelling & puzzle solving skills with this incredibly addicting bouquet of word games.

name: Sonic X Snake
description: Sonic X Snake is an online Flash game published on the 4Kids TV website by 4Kids Entertainment in January 2005 to promote the then-airing anime series, Sonic X. It is a simple Sonic X-themed game of Snake.

name: Word Search Puzzle: Word Balls
description:
Sit back, take a deep breath, relax and challenge yourself with Word Balls, the best word puzzle game.
Every level has a unique subject with many words that are split into different balls. Your goal is to combine the letters in order to find the words! Simple and understandable but at the same time challenging and amusing, Word Balls delivers your daily brain training!

name: Words Scramble
description: Swap letters to unscramble words in this fun app. The letters are all laid out and all you have to do is decipher the words describing the beautiful images. So what are you waiting for, challenge yourself with a great combination of words and pictures. You also get to build your vocabulary on the way!

name: Word Stitch
description:
Word Stitch is a charming crossword game that’s way more than it “seams.” The words you find become patches for knitting beautiful and charming quilts! Fun and appropriate for all ages, you can play alone or cozied up to the same screen together. Make it a nightly spelling regimine for your kids, or just challenge yourself to the game’s hundreds of tailored levels. Sewing and crochet are the world’s most popular hobby, and now it’s in lovable word game form on your phone!
Privacy Notice: Word Stitch collects your device’s IP address, advertising ID, and other partner specific identifiers. These identifiers enable personalized ads and analytics to improve our game. Opt-out or learn more by visiting our Privacy Center, accessible from the game's settings.

name: Words with AI
description: English version of famous Russian word game Erudite, originally inspired by Scrabble. The game is meant to enrich vocabulary and develop logical thinking. You need to compose words on a game field with tiles of different value. Unlike original game there are some differences: you can put several words at a turn, starting 7-letter word is always placed on start, etc.

name: Ultimate Dice Wars: Reborn
description: Ultimate Dice Wars: Reborn is a turned-based strategy game similar to Risk. Dice Wars is a combination of strategy and luck. The better your strategy the less you rely on luck.

name: Undead Carnage League
description:
A virus broke out of the inner cities, zombies spread across the planet, and now… life’s pretty boring. What do you do for fun in a post-apocalyptic world? Jump in your car and join the Undead Carnage League.
Join the elite zombie smashers, hit the road and run down as many of the drooling mindless horde as you can, grabbing their gold teeth and avoiding obstacles and zombie rockets. The more gold teeth you collect, the more choices you have to upgrade to some sweet new wheels. Compete against other dangerous drivers and throw them off course with your own explosive ammo to top the global leaderboard for the highest honour - the Undead Carnage League trophy.

name: US Basketball HD
description:
Become basketball star wherever you go!
When there is no opportunity to play real basketball, enjoy virtual US Basketball!
Who says that basketball can be played just with basketball on the sports ground? Compete with your friends on the screen of your devices using various spherical objects with unique characteristics – bowling and billiard balls, and even symbolic ball characters.
Take the most comfortable ball and set up records!
Playing basketball visit famous places of the USA!

name: Various Daylife: Mobile
description: In the year 211 of the Imperial Era, a new continent was discovered. Explore its every last corner as a settler of Antoecia, while living your life to the fullest in the city of Erebia.

name: Versus: Boys and Girls
description: Girls versus Boys is a world-wide challenge to once and for all decide which gender is king-of-the-hill. Play as either Girl or Boy and gather points to improve your team score.

name: Vertigo: Binaural Beats
description:
Beware! The game might take you over after some time of gameplay!
In an altered reality parallel universe you as the glowing dot named "vertigo" try to escape the impossible maze with traps!

name: What's the Baby Animal?
description: Everyone loves Baby Animals, but how well do you know them? What’s The Baby Animal? is all about kittens, puppies, chicks, ducklings and other adorable animals.

name: What's the Movie?
description:
Think you're the biggest movie junkie?
Test your knowledge on more than 290+ levels as you try to unscramble the letters to find the title of movie displayed in the pic.
Feeling stuck? Reach out to your friends and followers, or use the in game powerups for help.

name: What's the Year
description: What’s The Year is a new quiz where your knowledge can be tested. What do you know about ww1 or ww2? What do you know in general? With this fantastic quiz you can show off your skills and how good you really are. See who gets the highest score among your friends.

name: Wheels on Fire
description:
Fasten your seat belts and be prepared for a high-speed-experience. One simple goal: Go as far as possible. Step on the gas. Avoid the other cars on the street. Feel the power of speed.
The game is fully controlled with the accelerometer.
Do you have what it takes for THIS experience...?

name: Whiskers
description: Size is the name of the game in Whiskers. Collect kitty food to grow bigger, and use four unique powerups to steal size from your friends. Become as big as the screen and you win! Pick from over 50 mustaches for your adorable pixel kitten and then do battle with up to three of your friends.

name: Wildshade Fantasy Horse Races
description:
Have you heard of the Wildshade horses? Breed your dream horse with over 40 million options, equip each horse with matching tack, and prove that you are worthy of the legendary Wildshade herd. Win magical horse races in a fantastical, adventure-filled world!
Long ago, once a year near the village of Wildshade, something magical took place. A rainbow glow filled the sky, a sign that the wild horses of Wildshade had returned! Nobody knew where they came from or where they would return to. But one thing they did know for sure was that the horses were proud, brave, and worthy of respect. The villagers gathered for a race, each horse choosing their own rider. No sooner were they on the horse than each rider felt free, unbeatable.
And then, tragedy struck: the village and the surrounding area caught fire, the flames were unstoppable. The Wildshade horses never returned. The village was rebuilt and the people returned, the landscape recovered, but there was no sign of the horses.
The people in the village held horse races in memory of those beautiful wild beasts, trying to recapture those magical moments of the past when the horses would appear and the wild race began.
And now you, too can experience the magic of the Wildshade horses, thanks to Wildshade the game. There are plenty of wild horse races and beautiful, fantastic horses just waiting to meet you!

name: Wild Roads
description:
Test your driving skill and anticipation with "Wild Roads", a simple, fun and highly addictive game.
The goal? Go as far as possible with your shipment. But beware, if you end up dropping all of your cages, you will only have to return to the starting point in an attempt to set a new record.
"Wild roads", it's more than 50 characters and 20 vehicles to unlock !
Here is a game that will delight all players looking for a casual, fun and original game.
In addition, it's free, so do not hesitate!

name: Who's the Celeb?
description:
Think you know your athletes, actors, and music stars? Test your knowledge as you try to unscramble the letters of these celebrities displayed in the pic.
Do you have what it takes to hang with the world's most powerful elite like Kim Kardashian, Brad Pitt and LeBron James? Let's find out.

name: Sonic x Vapor
description:
Sonic x Vapor was a promotional advergame released in 2012. It was a collaboration between Sega and Nike to promote Nike's Vapor shoes. The graphics and gameplay are based on those of the original 16-bit Sonic the Hedgehog, though Sonic's sprites have been altered so that he wears the eponymous shoes.

In the game, Sonic runs endlessly through a level. The player must destroy Badniks and collect Rings for points. The player will encounter soccer balls, which can be kicked to destroy Badniks. Speed increases as the game goes on. Losing a life ends the game. After the game ends, the player may post their score on their Facebook or Twitter account.

name: Trabi vs. Zombies: Apocalypse VR
description:
Kill zombies with your deadly weapon - upgraded car from East Germany!
Zombie apocalypse is coming! Kill so many zombies as is possible and stay alive. You have got powerful weapon, car from East Germany - Trabant! You can play survive highway or accomplish hard, nearly impossible missions.
Upgrade your Trabi to deadly weapon. Buy more rockets, bigger fuel or powerful jet. There is also deadly Blade.

name: Tricky Questions
description:
4 types of levels! Choose one pic as an answer.
Get smart with our Tricky Questions game!

name: Tricky Geometry
description:
Jump and dash your way in Tricky Geometry, near impossible running game. Tap to jump and flip through the tricky squares and spiky obstacles !
Cross designed geometry levels, think and jump fast the tricky squares obstacles, every square color behave differently and can be unpredictable, challenge your limits! Simple one touch game play that will keep you entertained for hours! Play Tricky Geometry, Dash and Jump,enjoy it as much as you can!

name: Three Hoops
description:
It is a game where you put the ball in the hoop of the same color.
The method of moving the hoop is to move left and right while touching the screen.
Good luck.

name: Tiana Saves Xmas
description:
Santa is getting ready to deliver all the presents for Christmas and they all got blown away in the wind.
Help the head elf Tiana save Christmas by collecting all the presents with Santa's sleigh, so all the kids around the world will get their Christmas presents in time.
Don't forget to keep the reindeer fed with carrots so they can use their magic to fly.
Watch out for the snowballs that will end the game.
Good luck!

name: Tic-Tac-Toast
description: Just like traditional Tic-Tac-Toe, try to get three in a row in any direction before your opponent. But beginning with your fourth move, your oldest move will DISAPPEAR with every new turn! Incredibly simple, yet amazingly challenging.

name: Tiffany Alvord Dream World
description:
Tiffany Alvord’s first official game! Live a life of music, glamor, and endless fashion choices! Look fabulous, sound great, meet interesting new people, and put on a stellar show in! The YouTube sensation comes to your mobile device like never before!
Musician extraordinaire Tiffany Alvord knows what it takes to become a superstar. Tiffany’s advice on the ups and downs of the music business will be essential to your rise to stardom. With her model’s fashion sense, charm, soulful performances, and enthralling vocals, Tiffany Alvord will guide you to become the superstar you’ve always dreamed of being.
Let Tiffany help you turn your fantasy of fame and success into reality! Your avatar will perform on stage, dress up in the most stylish clothes, interact with fellow stars, recruit members for your band, and pose for photo shoots in your very own studio! But that’s just the beginning; there are a lot more cool jobs to do, new people to meet, awards to win, and fun mini-games to play!
Even someone with as much talent as Tiffany had to start somewhere, and it will take just as much hard work until your first breakthrough. Don’t hesitate—your dazzling debut awaits and Tiffany Alvord will show you the way!

name: Tile Star 2
description: Tile Star 2 — is a puzzle game. Make all tiles yellow color to complete each level. You only have a set number of moves to complete each level. Clicking one tile would change its and its neighbors color.
